#### 1.3. Recursion

Recursive functions are meaningless without a base case and domain. For example, without setting $f(0) = a$ in $\mathbb{Z}$ , for example, the following is meaningless. This is true in mathematics and also in any algorithm implmentation.
$$
f(x) = 2f(x-1) + x^2
$$
